sentences: In its decision (FCCC/SBI/2010/L.24/Add.1), the COP takes note of the above-mentioned reports.

The COP also, inter alia : urgesparties to further contribute to the Trust Fund for Participation in the UNFCCC Process and the Trust Fund for Supplementary Activities; reiterates its appreciation to the German Government for its annual voluntary contribution to the core budget of â¬766,938 and its special contribution of â¬1,789,522 as Host Government to the Secretariat in Bonn; and agrees that SBI 35 should take up the issue of the functioning of the Secretariat.
